total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the size of the input grid.
Q2: Create a new grid of the same size.
Q3: Fill the new grid with 1s in every cell.
Q4: For every second cell in each row starting from the second cell, replace the 1 with a 0.
Q5: Repeat the process for every second row starting from the second row.
Q1: Identify the size of the input grid.
Q2: Determine the pattern of the output grid based on the examples given.
Q3: Identify the pattern of alternating 1s and 0s in the output grid.
Q4: Determine the pattern of 1s in the rows and columns of the output grid.
Q5: Apply the identified pattern to the input grid to generate the output grid.
